name: Light Kea
description:
Google Chrome is highly recommended!

Your name is HINDRIK LILJESTRØM, and you're the newest employee of the KEA! This store prides itself in selling all the furniture any person could need. And today is the first time you're running the night shift. There's a legend amongst the other employees: Make sure you clean everything and close up before midnight, because that's when the furniture comes to life… And you're already running late. Will you beat the beds assaulting you? Or will you be overrun by the lamps and tables?

CONTROLS:

Mouse and Keyboard:
- Use WASD to walk
- Use the mouse to aim
- Use Left-click to swing

Controller:
- Use left stick to walk
- Use right stick to aim
- Use RT/RB/X to swing
